price: 52. Ee adigu (Nabiyow) wax ma maqashiin kartid maytida, mana maqashiin kartid kuwa dhegaha la’ dhawaaqa, markay tagaan oo dhabarka jeediyaan.
arabic: فَإِنَّكَ لَا تُسۡمِعُ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ وَلَا تُسۡمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ ٱلدُّعَآءَ إِذَا وَلَّوۡاْ مُدۡبِرِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-innaka lā tus'miʿu al-mawtā walā tus'miʿu al-ṣuma al-duʿāa idhā wallaw mud'birīna
